description: Details submitted pursuant to Condition 5 (materials), 8 (energy) and 14 (screening) of planning permission 01019/14-15/P7 dated 22/01/2015 for variation of reserved matters pursuant to conditions 3 and 4 of planning permission 01019/14-15/P6 granted on 27/02/2015 to read 'approval of the detail of landscaping of the site (hereinafter called the reserved matters) shall be obtained from the local planning authority in writing before any development is commenced.' And ' Plans and particulars of the reserved matters referred to in condition 2 relating to the landscaping of the site shall be submitted in writing to the local planning authority and shall be carried out as approved.' For demolition of the existing houses and erection of a three storey flatted block consisting of 6 one bedroom flats and 3 two bedroom flats, parking and associated landscaping (outline application). Drawing Numbers: Site plan and 4169-A-05 received 07.12.11, 4169 D 11K and 4169 D 12F received 20.02.12, 21 Rev. A. received 15.05.17.
